features: Featuring an 8-inch long blade, 13 inches in total length, 1.84 inches wide, and with a blade thickness of 1.7mm.
Designed for multiple functions, serving not only as a chef's knife but also as a fruit knife, carving knife, cheese knife, and more.
Enhanced Stability: Equipped with three rivets, this chef's knife offers enhanced stability and strength. It is built to withstand the rigors of daily kitchen use, ensuring long-lasting performance.
Crafted with a high-quality stainless steel blade, ensuring sharpness and durability to effortlessly cut through various ingredients
The elegant wooden handle provides a comfortable and secure grip, allowing for precise control during culinary tasks.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Experience Precision and Versatility with the feng&feng 8-Inch Wood Handle Chef's Knife Effortless Versatility: From Tough-Skinned Produce to Delicate Slicing Introducing the feng&feng 8-Inch Wood Handle Chef's Knife, a premium kitchen tool crafted with precision and designed for culinary excellence. This versatile stainless steel knife features a sharp and durable blade, ensuring precise cuts for various ingredients. Unleash Your Culinary Creativity with a Professional-Grade Multi-Purpose Knife Unleash Your Culinary Creativity: From slicing and dicing to mincing and chopping, this professional-grade chef's knife effortlessly handles a wide range of tasks. Whether you're a seasoned chef or a passionate home cook, this multi-purpose knife is an essential companion in your kitchen. Superior Construction and Comfortable Grip for Optimal Performance The 8-inch stainless steel blade delivers exceptional sharpness and long-lasting durability. The wood handle provides an ergonomic and comfortable grip, allowing for precise control during intricate cuts and prolonged use.

Experience Effortless Versatility: This chef's knife is ideal for fruits, vegetables, meats, and more. It easily handles tough-skinned produce like pineapples and melons, while also delicately slicing tomatoes and herbs. Elevate your culinary creations and impress your guests with the precise cuts achieved by this remarkable knife. Easy Care and Maintenance: Handwash this knife with mild soap and water to maintain its optimal performance. The stainless steel blade resists corrosion, and occasional honing will keep it razor-sharp for a lifetime of use. Invest in Quality and Precision: The feng&feng 8-Inch Wood Handle Chef's Knife is meticulously crafted with attention to detail, ensuring a reliable and high-performance tool in your kitchen. Experience the difference this knife makes in your cooking endeavors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lo volveré a comprar , ya he comprado 4 vezes (hasta para regalar) porq esta muy bueno . Lo r recomiendo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's just okay it's not my favorite knife. The knife is very sharp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loving this knife. Needed a sharp , non serrated blade.Very reasonably priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice cooking knife.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this knife for a while and I really do enjoy it. The handle is sturdy and it’s easy to clean. I have to sharpen it every now and again. But it cuts smoothly through my tough meat and my vegetables.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sharp and slices well
reviews.reviewText: This knife has a wooden handle. The handle is not polished wood and not coated. But, it does feel well-balanced in the hand. The blade is full tang with three rivets. To me, it feels light, which may be due to the wooden handle. But, the balance it alright. Since the handle is not coated, I would hand wash it only. Using a dishwasher might damage the handle.It is nice and sharp right out of the box. It sliced very easily through tomatoes and lettuce. I don't use my knives on meats since I am vegetarian, so I can't speak to how well it will cut meats. But, it seems to be fine as an all-around vegetable knife in my kitchen so far. I have no complaints other than the handle feels a bit light in the hand. It is perfectly functional and does a great job. It's a nice budget chef knife, in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars feng&feng 8-Inch Chef's Knife: Good Value
reviews.reviewText: This 8-inch chef's knife offers a good weight and grip, making it comfortable to use. While it may dull a bit faster compared to more expensive knives, it's hard to complain given its affordable price. Plus, the blade can always be re-sharpened, making it a practical choice for everyday kitchen tasks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressively heavy and well-balanced chef's knife that keeps it's edge. A great value!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent 8 inch chef's knife that looks good, performs well, and is a good value.The blade is razor sharp, and heavy enough to make short work of cubing even very dense foods like large sweet potatoes. (See photo.) It always makes me nervous to have to chop through dense vegetables but this knife just glided right through.The wooden handle is attractive and well balanced; and the knife feels comfortable in the hand.Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really sharp knife. The handle is a little rough to the hand as it is made with raw wood. There is no finish on the handle so not sure how long it will hold up. I did add some olive oil to it to see if I could protect it a little better. It is a very sharp knife though which I really like. It is my "go to" knife now when in the kitchen. I may take some sandpaper to the handle to smooth it out. Not sure how many people would want to do that though.
